description: Calisanlarin gruplara atanma bilgilerini iceren tablo. Calisan-grup iliskisini ve oncelik bilgisini saklar.

indexes.properties: Dup, Modif, Dup, Modif, Modif, Seg

commonQueries.query: SELECT eg.*, e.CODE AS CalisanKodu, e.NAME AS CalisanAdi FROM LG_XXX_EMGRPASS eg INNER JOIN LG_XXX_EMPLOYEE e ON eg.EMPREF = e.LOGICALREF WHERE eg.EMPGRPREF = @GrupRef ORDER BY eg.PRIORITY

commonQueries.description: Belirli bir calisanin dahil oldugu gruplari listele
commonQueries.query: SELECT eg.*, g.CODE AS GrupKodu, g.NAME AS GrupAdi FROM LG_XXX_EMGRPASS eg INNER JOIN LG_XXX_EMPGROUP g ON eg.EMPGRPREF = g.LOGICALREF WHERE eg.EMPREF = @CalisanRef
